title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises the NFL for being bold and making big moves that aren't always viewed as popular after reports show the success of teams that have moved to Las Vegas and Los Angeles. He believes this NFL team should be targeting Jimmy Garoppolo as he returns from shoulder surgery and the 49ers look to go all in on Trey Lance. He also shares his predictions for the 2022 NFL standings. Plus, 11 year NBA veteran Cuttino Mobley joins the show in studio to talk about the struggles of Russell Westbrook and how the NBA owners are working to get power back from the superstar players. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
